p: Temperature data ( Fig. 1) were collected at the weather station of Eelde, approximately 7 km from the aviaries ( http://www.knmi.nl/klimatologie/), where temperature was recorded 1.5 m above ground, every hour with accuracy of 0.1 °C. DTR is the difference between maximum (MaxT) and minimum (MinT) temperature within one day. Both MinT and DTR measured at the weather station correlate well with the measurements at the aviaries (N = 1196, r = 0.96 and 0.83 for MinT and DTR respectively; Supplementary Fig. S2).
